books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: Samuel Sooleymon receives a basketball scholarship to North Carolina Central and determines to bring his family over from a civil war-ravaged South Sudan.
books.name: SOOLEY

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: Two estranged sisters, one a former best-selling author, the other a nun, reconnect as one searches for the child the other gave up.
books.name: FINDING ASHLEY

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: Aloysius Archer, a World War II veteran, seeks to apprentice with Willie Dash, a private eye, in a corrupt California town.
books.name: A GAMBLING MAN

books.author: by Martha Wells
books.description: The sixth book in the Murderbot Diaries series. When a dead body turns up on Preservation Station, Murderbot must speak to humans.
books.name: FUGITIVE TELEMETRY

books.author: by Amanda Gorman
books.description: The poem read on President Joe Biden's Inauguration Day, by the youngest poet to write and perform an inaugural poem.
books.name: THE HILL WE CLIMB

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: As dust storms roll during the Great Depression, Elsa must choose between saving the family and farm or heading West.
books.name: THE FOUR WINDS

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: The 31st book in the Prey series. When federal officers are killed, Lucas Davenport and Virgil Flowers team up to investigate matters.
books.name: OCEAN PREY

books.author: by Matt Haig
books.description: Nora Seed finds a library beyond the edge of the universe that contains books with multiple possibilities of the lives one could have lived.
books.name: THE MIDNIGHT LIBRARY

books.author: by Lee Child and Andrew Child
books.description: Jack Reacher intervenes on an ambush in Tennessee and uncovers a conspiracy.
books.name: THE SENTINEL

books.author: by Karen Kingsbury
books.description: A secret agent with the F.B.I. and a young woman betrothed by her father to a drug lord pretend to be in love for a mission.
books.name: A DISTANT SHORE

books.author: by Lynsay Sands
books.description: The 32nd book in the Argeneau series.
books.name: MEANT TO BE IMMORTAL

books.author: by Timothy Zahn
books.description: In this Star Wars saga, Thrawn and the Expansionary Defense Fleet discover how their enemy truly operates.
books.name: THRAWN ASCENDANCY: GREATER GOOD

books.author: by Jhumpa Lahiri
books.description: A woman who feels lost in life finds solace in the city she calls home and gets a new outlook while visiting the sea.
books.name: WHEREABOUTS

books.author: by Madeline Miller
books.description: A reimagining of Homer’s “Iliad” that is narrated by Achilles' companion Patroclus.
books.name: THE SONG OF ACHILLES
